metadata.title: CVE-2024-6717 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 1.6.12 up to 1.7.9, and 1.8.1 archiveunpacking during migration is vulnerable to path escaping of the allocationdirectory. This vulnerability, CVE-2024-6717, is fixed in Nomad 1.6.13,1.7.10, and 1.8.2.

criterions.comment: nomad package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
